name: Kidney beans
description:
• Kidney beans are a type of legume commonly used in various cuisines, particularly in Latin American, Indian, and Middle Eastern cooking.
• They are often used in dishes such as chili con carne, stews, and curries, adding texture and flavor to the recipes.
• Kidney beans can also be used in salads, dips, and as a topping for tacos and other Mexican-inspired dishes.

name: broccoli
description:
• Broccoli is a versatile vegetable often used in a variety of dishes, including soups, salads, and stir-fries.
• Its florets can be steamed, roasted, or sautéed as a side dish or added to main courses.
• It's also a key ingredient in many Italian and Asian recipes, such as pasta sauces and stir-fry dishes.

name: Garam Masala
description:
• Garam Masala is a blend of ground spices commonly used in Indian and other South Asian cuisines to add warmth and depth to various dishes.
• It is typically added towards the end of cooking to preserve its aromatic flavor and is often used in curries, stews, and other savory recipes.
• Garam Masala can be adjusted to suit individual tastes, with some recipes calling for a light sprinkle or others requiring a more generous amount.

name: Urad dal
description:
• Urad dal is a type of split black gram commonly used in Indian cuisine, particularly in the preparation of idlis, dosas, and vadas.
• It is often used in combination with rice to make fermented batter, which is then cooked into various dishes.
• Urad dal can also be used to make a variety of snacks, such as papads and pakoras, and is often added to soups and stews for added flavor and texture.

name: Nutmeg
description:
• Nutmeg is a popular spice commonly used in baking and cooking, particularly in sweet dishes such as pies, cakes, and custards.
• It is also used to add warmth and depth to savory dishes like stews, soups, and meat recipes.
• Whole nutmeg seeds can be grated over food for an extra burst of flavor.

name: Rice
description:
• Rice is a staple food made from the edible starchy grains of the rice plant, commonly used in various cuisines around the world.
• It is often served alongside other dishes, such as curries, stews, and stir-fries, and can also be used as an ingredient in salads, desserts, and side dishes.
• With numerous varieties available, including white, brown, jasmine, and basmati, rice is a versatile ingredient in many different types of cooking.

name: Banana
description:
• Bananas are a popular fruit often eaten fresh as a sweet snack or used in various desserts.
• They can be blended into smoothies, used in baked goods, or as a topping for oatmeal or yogurt.
• Bananas are also a common ingredient in fruit salads and can be grilled or sautéed for added texture.

name: Papaya
description:
• Papaya is a tropical fruit often eaten fresh, used in salads, or blended into smoothies.
• Its juicy pulp and sweet flavor make it a popular ingredient in various desserts and sweet dishes.
• Papaya is also used in savory recipes, adding a unique flavor and texture to dishes like curries and salsas.
